2016-01-01|2016-12-30.description: Batgirl’s about to lose the greatest weapon in her arsenal…her mind is failing her! Is her ragtag group of allies enough to pick up the slack?
2016-01-01|2016-12-30.name: Police + Thieves

2016-01-01|2016-12-30.description:
The end is neigh as the penultimate issue of God is Dead is unleashed! We have seen the world destroyed and rebuilt in new images time and time again. But something is different this go round... the final cycle of destruction and chaos are playing out for the doomed inhabitants and no power on Heaven or Earth can prevent the End. Don't miss out on the true end of days and the final fate of this tortured planet in the pages of God is Dead.

Available with Regular Cover by Jacen Burrows, Enchanting, Iconic Covers & End of Days covers by Ron Adrian, Carnage Wraparound Covers by German Nobile, and a special Gilded Incentive Cover also by Adrian.

Translates Convergence: Detective Comics #1-2, Convergence: Shadow of the Bat #1-2, Convergence: Batman and the Outsiders #1-2 & Convergence: Batgirl #1-2.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1 (#503): A Demon Lives in Las Vegas
  • Chapter 2 (#504): This is a Story of Friendship
  • Chapter 3 (#505): Read this only after reading Chapter 1 of Ad Astra Per Aspera
  • Chapter 4 (#506): Older female relatives tend not to mind their own business
  • Chapter 5 (#507): Karakoi
  • Chapter 6 (#508): Even Tonegawa Would Hesitate
  • Chapter 7 (#509): On a three day two night trip to Paris, this manga's editor had the bad luck to have his wallet stolen on the first day, to be bedridden by a stomachache the next day, and to return home without doing anything the last day.
  • Chapter 8 (#510): That's Why The Girl Loves
  • Chapter 9 (#511): The More I Drew, The Cuter Kananiwa-san Became.
  • Chapter 10 (#512): I Want to Visit the Grand Canyon
  • Chapter 11 (#513): A Financial Lesson for Good Kids: Money is More Important than Your Life
2016-01-01|2016-12-30.name: Vol. 47

2016-01-01|2016-12-30.description:
Tethered Reprieve

Chapter 05 of Avaiyo, Vol. 04

Successfully infiltrating the encampment, Emerald Moon now stands before the very heart of the Dark Legion. In their efforts to destroy the Command Center, they've unwillingly become pinned between an impenetrable barrier and an army of undead Neyens commanded by Xaemons of the Dark Legion. With danger coming from all sides, Fayli, Lage and Eyader have only one choice...to engage the enemy.
2016-01-01|2016-12-30.name: Tethered Reprieve

2016-01-01|2016-12-30.description: Translates Detective Comics #41-42 & Convergence: Batman and the Outsiders #2

It’s time for some serious Batman action! In this issue, you can see the new Batman, Jim Gordon, going up against the deadly Mr. Bloom, plus in Batman Eternal, the original Batman Bruce Wayne faces the Architect and make a shocking discovery! Plus, there’s the latest instalment of Damian’s ‘Year of Blood’!

Calie, Violet, and the Dark Cheshire continue to hunt the denizens of Wonderland on Earth! An escaped and mutilated victim leads the Liddles to the hidden horror chamber ruled by Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dum. To get close, Calie and Violet must become victims of the Tweedles latest plot.

Bolstered by Arthur's love, Mera descends into Atlantis to confront her betrothed for what's rightfully her birthright-her throne!
2016-01-01|2016-12-30.name: War Stories Part 2 of 3

2016-01-01|2016-12-30.description:
ALL-NEW ARC! ALL-NEW JUMPING-ON POINT! The march toward the greatest Valiant milestone of all time starts here as X-O Manowar begins “LONG LIVE THE KING”!

They are The Torment – and their name means death. Thought to be a legend by the extraterrestrial empire called the Vine, they have now become Earth’s violent reality. They have traveled for eons to reach us…in search of Aric of Dacia, the unstoppable X-O Manowar. How can Aric of Dacia defeat an omnipotent threat nearly as old as the universe itself? Will the X-O Manowar armor truly be our world’s salvation, just as the Vine’s myths foretold? Is this the beginning of the end for X-O Manowar…or the beginning of something bigger?

Plus: The X-O MANOWAR #50 COUNTDOWN GIVEAWAY begins here! Each issue of “LONG LIVE THE KING” comes bagged with one of 50 exclusive micro-prints from comics’ leading talents…or hand-drawn ORIGINAL ARTWORK!

2016-01-01|2016-12-30.deck: Un'inquieta presenza attende la Grande Armata napoleonica nel gelo del deserto di neve!
2016-01-01|2016-12-30.description: Logorata dalla strategia russa della “terra bruciata”, la Grande Armata napoleonica si ritira – lacera a affamata – attraverso un deserto di neve. Un tozzo di pane e un fuoco intorno a cui scaldarsi; gli uomini del capitano Lozère non chiedono altro. Quando quel lontano bagliore, tiepido e invitante, appare sotto il grigio mortifero del cielo, per loro sembra rinascere la speranza… Eppure, è come se nell’aria gelida e cupa, ci fosse qualcosa di sinistro, una sensazione inafferrabile, una presenza senza volto che attende il loro arrivo con immortale pazienza…
2016-01-01|2016-12-30.name: Sangue E Ghiaccio

The election race between Filthy Rich and Mayor Mare is closer than expected! With disagreements between friends growing, will the town find a way to unify and chose the right candidate?
